搚字的基本解释

搚
lā
古同“拉”，折断：“于其乘焉，搚幹而杀之。”

搚
xié
古同“拹”。

搚
xiàn
引从。

搚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lā］
［《廣韻》盧合切，入合，來。］
亦作“拹1”。
拉，折。

搚字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　搚； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页447第04
【集韻】迄業切。同拹。或作㩉。詳拹字註。　又【唐韻】盧合切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】落合切，?與拉同。【公羊傳·莊元年】搚幹而殺之。【註】搚，折聲也。　又【唐韻】盧盍切，音臘。義同。　又【集韻】虛欠切，險去聲。引從也。

搚字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
搚字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Squeeze
lā
Gu Tong "pulls" and breaks: "Yu Qi takes Yan, dry it and kill it."
Squeeze
xié
The ancient same "Fang".
Squeeze
xiàn
Follow.
Squeeze
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lā］
["Guangyun" Lu Heqie, enter and come. ]
Also known as "Nan 1".
Pull, fold.
Squeeze
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　搚; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 447 04
[Ji Yun] So far, the industry is cut. The same. Or make 㩉. Detailed note of the word.　[Tang Yun] Lu Heqie [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Ochiai cut, and Latong. [Gongyang Chuan·Zhuangyuan] Dry and kill it. [Note] Zip, fold the sound.　[Tang Yun] Lu Qiqie, Yin La. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] The virtual lack of cut, the sound of danger. Quoting from also.
